patthana8.28:1.1_0: Naganthasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.28:1.1_1: Naganthasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.28:1.1_2: Naganthasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthasampayutto ca naganthavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.28:2.1_0: Naganthavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.28:2.1_1: Naganthavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.28:2.1_2: Naganthavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthasampayutto ca naganthavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.28:3.1_0: Naganthasampayuttañca naganthavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.28:3.1_1: Naganthasampayuttañca naganthavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.28:3.1_2: Naganthasampayuttañca naganthavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthasampayutto ca naganthavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.28:4.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
